beer.beer_description: LOVE is bursting with hoppy tropical flavors. Built on a simple base of Pilsner malt and rolled oats, this super dank IPA has a pillowy mouthfeel and is double dry-hopped with Mosaic, Citra and Sabro. Flavors of mango, cantaloupe, and citrus will keep you infatuated.

items.badge_description: There's beer in them thar hills! You're setting off on your journey through the world of beer, but be sure to take a little time to get to know each brewery as you go. That's a beer from 400 different breweries. Try 5 more for Level 81!

Celebrating Pride doesn't stop when June ends. Thanks for supporting the Queer community 365 days out of the year by checking in a beer from one of these Queer-owned and Queer-led breweries! Now keep going. Try 5 more for Level 7.

user.bio: Husband | Father | Sales Manager | Seeker of Craft Beer and a Jedi, like My Father before Me.
Married to MoJoe. Traveler. Writer. You had me at day drinking.

⚡️⚡️All I wanna do is drink beer for breakfast...⚡️⚡️
